articles.title: Pele 'will spend Christmas in hospital' after medical reports show his cancer has WORSENED' - Daily Mail
articles.description: Pele, 82, has been battling colon cancer since September 2021 and was hospitalized on November 29 for doctors to reevaluate his treatment but his condition is said to have worsened.
articles.content:
Brazilian soccer icon Pele's health has worsened and he will spend Christmas in hospital as he continues to battle colon cancer.
